about_the_game:
Whether you're looking for colony soldiers and engineers or large-scale alien bosses, Sci-Fi Battlers 2 is a pack you won't want to miss!

The battlers in this pack is a perfect companion to Sci-Fi Battler Pack and Sci Fi Battlebacks. Created in Michael Galefire's signature painted style, Sci-Fi Battlers 2 features new enemies that will bring your futuristic battles to life. Inspired by a variety of modern video games and comic books, this pack features a sleek design and concepts to inspire your game development.

This pack contains:
  • 19 battlers that can be used in front view and side-view alike.
  • Varying sizes -- from small henchmen to big bad bosses.
  • Easy to use and formatted for RPG Maker MV.
  • Compatible with Sci-Fi Battlers, Sci Fi Battlebacks and Michael's free work.
  • BONUS: Facesets for each battler, compatible with RPG Maker MV.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Sci-Fi Battlers 2" and "RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Battlers 2" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Battlers 2

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Battlers 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
